question: What is the Purpose of React Router?
answer: Basically React router used for to go from i path to another. In html we can use anchor tag like this. In react.Js we also can use the anchor tag. Also we can fixed some item like header, sidebar in a Main page so we cannot add thore common item in every path of out webside. question: How does Context API works?
answer: We know that react is a uni-directional JS framework. We can only shift variable from parent to it's childern. But if we use normal meathod we should send the data serially. Like as property received father from Grandpa and reveived me by my dad. But sometimes it really annoying when we work with a bit react project and makes a lot of components. Thats why here introduce the react Context api. By using this we can easily transfer data from parent to it's any child not to send data serially. For this at first we should make a createContext() and saved a data on it . Then we can received this data of it's any of child by using useContext()
